channel.title: Does this mean I can't set up a server..?
channel.description: I checked a lot of tutorials, downloaded bases and all that stuff, but still, if I dont buy VPS, I cant set up a server that will be editable and joinable by other players? If I can, then how? :| :confused:

item.title: Does this mean I can't set up a server..?
item.dc:creator: @CryTech CryTech
item.description:
@CryTech wrote:

And another question,where can i get a decent client base? Without all the dumb stuff like monsters in city, just a plain server to modify myself?

Read full topic
item.source: Does this mean I can't set up a server..?

item.title: Does this mean I can't set up a server..?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

Being honest, I have never managed to configure the damn No-Ip. And yes, you would have to get a decent connection otherwise all the players will lag.

Read full topic
item.source: Does this mean I can't set up a server..?

item.title: Does this mean I can't set up a server..?
item.dc:creator: @CryTech CryTech
item.description:
@CryTech wrote:

So I need a good and stable internet for that? And I also wanted to ask, why doesnt No-IP work? I made a host, but i cant connect to it, it says that the server is not running, but when i enter standard IP,I manage to log into server. Any ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: Does this mean I can't set up a server..?

item.title: Does this mean I can't set up a server..?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

If you don’t buy VPS, can’t you host it on your own computer by running the Server. Although it may very well be laggy and unstable.

Read full topic
